ivardefs.name: condition
ivardefs.desc: A boolean-valued expression that is evaluated in the context of the container of the trigger definition and returns whether or not the trigger fires.

ivardefs.name: data_
ivardefs.desc: The triggering data of the event (if this is a data trigger). If more than one data is requirement is specified, then all the data requirements must be true.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: A formal name for the event. This may be an absolute URI that identifies the event formally (e.g. from a trigger registry), or a simple relative URI that identifies the event in a local context.

properties.desc: Base StructureDefinition for TriggerDefinition Type: A description of a triggering event. Triggering events can be named events, data events, or periodic, as determined by the type element.
